title: Employment for towns by broad industry groups, Business Register and Employment Survey (BRES)
description: Annual employee and employment estimates for towns in England and Wales split by broad industry groups. Results given by full-time and part-time employees.
datasetNotes: On the landing page scroll to Download associated with request and click the link a spreadsheet will open
sizingNotes: XLS spreadsheet with 3  tabs there are a number of ! in the data and i am in the process of confirming what these denote I will update once advised.
